resources.string: The Short Game is, Short. Battling out on a 8x8 Board to get to the exits while picking up as many batteries, the name is Speed, hence there is no Hack cards.
The Medium Game is your standard game, played on a 16x16 board, with the 4 players battling out for control for as many batteries as possible, but be careful, the time does not favour the unlucky.

The Long Game, or the "Big One", Is on a 25x25 board with 8 players battling it out over a longer time limit, with exits only opening after 5 turns and only 4 exits to leave from, this is hacker-mans frenzy and it does not support the unprepared.
